sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis said that a southern "cold war" could happen if Stacey Abrams wins Georgia's governor's race in November.
author: Hannah Getahun
title: DeSantis says 'Cold War' could ensue between Florida and Georgia if Stacey Abrams wins governor race
